## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (5c41d15d8ff848a96423547c190d01a2682a8fe8d120b27d52eafd48607b3f15)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@xenial-ux/services' @ 101.101.101 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
